I second this; I'm sure I could figure out the patch myself but there's no harm in you posting it [@Idolon](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/206255-idolon/)

I was having the same problem as many others where the contracts wouldn't recognize when I had more than 5m antenna capacity. I wasn't using the Real Antennas mod as other people were mentioning, but it turns out that the [Antenna Helper](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/188294-112x-antenna-helper-adopted-math-your-antenna-range-and-signal-strength/) mod has the same broken interaction. Once I removed that, the relay contracts recognize the antenna strength again.
